query.name: publishTimeMillis
query.description: Content release time, if it is to be released immediately, you can not pass it or pass 0. If you want to publish it regularly, pass > a timestamp of the current time, milliseconds and must be an hour.

query.name: extraTagIds
query.description: Additional tags that need to be added, such as fashion tags and sale tags

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/content/mcn/content/create')
request.add_api_parameter("kolUserId", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("contentType", "video")
request.add_api_parameter("description", "hello")
request.add_api_parameter("imageList", "http://a.jpg,http://b.jpg")
request.add_api_parameter("itemList", "111111,222222")
request.add_api_parameter("videoId", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("categoryId", "9527")
request.add_api_parameter("tags", "skirt,summer")
request.add_api_parameter("voiceLang", "en")
request.add_api_parameter("subtitleLang", "en")
request.add_api_parameter("descriptionLang", "en")
request.add_api_parameter("publishTimeMillis", "0")
request.add_api_parameter("shopId", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("proxyFlag", "false")
request.add_api_parameter("title", "this is title")
request.add_api_parameter("extraTagIds", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("channel", "mcn_aigc")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/content/mcn/content/create')
request.add_api_param('kolUserId', '123456')
request.add_api_param('contentType', 'video')
request.add_api_param('description', 'hello')
request.add_api_param('imageList', 'http://a.jpg,http://b.jpg')
request.add_api_param('itemList', '111111,222222')
request.add_api_param('videoId', '123456')
request.add_api_param('categoryId', '9527')
request.add_api_param('tags', 'skirt,summer')
request.add_api_param('voiceLang', 'en')
request.add_api_param('subtitleLang', 'en')
request.add_api_param('descriptionLang', 'en')
request.add_api_param('publishTimeMillis', '0')
request.add_api_param('shopId', '123456')
request.add_api_param('proxyFlag', 'false')
request.add_api_param('title', 'this is title')
request.add_api_param('extraTagIds', '1234')
request.add_api_param('channel', 'mcn_aigc')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
